co.cask.cdap.api.mapreduce

Interface MapReduceConfigurer


  • public interface MapReduceConfigurer
    Configurer for configuring MapReduce.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setDescription(String description)
      Sets the description of the MapReduce.
      void setInputDataset(String dataset)
      Sets the name of the dataset used as input for the MapReduce.
      void setMapperResources(Resources resources)
      Sets the resources requirement for Mapper task of the MapReduce.
      void setName(String name)
      Sets the name of the MapReduce.
      void setOutputDataset(String dataset)
      Sets the name of the dataset used as output for the MapReduce.
      void setProperties(Map<String,String> properties)
      Sets a set of properties that will be available through the PropertyProvider.getProperties() at runtime.
      void setReducerResources(Resources resources)
      Sets the resources requirement for Reducer task of the MapReduce.
      void useDatasets(Iterable<String> datasets)
      Deprecated. 
      datasets used in runtime need not be specified in MapReduce.configure(co.cask.cdap.api.mapreduce.MapReduceConfigurer)

    • Method Detail

        Sets a set of properties that will be available through the PropertyProvider.getProperties() at runtime.
        Parameters:
        properties - the properties to set

      • useDatasets

        @Deprecated
void useDatasets(Iterable<String> datasets)
        Deprecated. datasets used in runtime need not be specified in MapReduce.configure(co.cask.cdap.api.mapreduce.MapReduceConfigurer)
        Specifies set of dataset names that are used by the MapReduce.
